title: Calories in a Sushi Roll
meta_description: Learn calories in sushi roll, with breakdown of carbs, protein, fat, sodium, and tips for different types and tweaks.
assumptions: Standard 8-piece roll (~225 g) with sushi rice, nori, avocado, and imitation crab; no sauces or extras.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by type, ingredients, rice vinegar, portion size, and preparation; check restaurant info or labels.

quick_answer.text: A standard sushi roll contains about 255 kcal, mostly from rice carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add spicy mayo drizzle per roll
Use fresh tuna instead of imitation crab

faqs.q: How many calories in a California sushi roll?
faqs.a: About 255 kcal for an 8-piece California roll with imitation crab and avocado.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a sushi roll?
faqs.a: Typically 38 g carbs per roll, mainly from seasoned sushi rice.

faqs.q: Is a sushi roll high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 600 mg per roll due to soy sauce in rice and fillings.

faqs.q: How many calories in a vegetarian sushi roll?
faqs.a: Slightly lower at ~235 kcal without fish or crab.
About 9 g protein per standard roll from rice and fillings.
